number of helpful: 263 of 286 people (92%) found this review helpful215 people found this review funny
content:
Posted: November 1, 2014
												...I just spent almost 2 hours in an online match with some random guy.  Neither of us were trying to win the game (bridge builder).  We were pretty much on par with one another skill-wise in the beginning.  Suddenly he pulls a fancy move and teabags my character, grabbing his head and smacking his junk against his face.  It was hysterical. I did the same thing right back, attempting to ride his face 'Gangnam style.' This went back and forth from a number of bizarre homo-erotic positions.  The novelty just did not seem to wear off.Thank you, random guy.   Sorry I ended up failing in the end and ruining our teabag-fest. Whether you're good at this game or terrible, it's guaranteed to bring numerous smirks and snickers if low-brow humour tickles your pickle.  The pros+ Hilarious 'QWOP' style ragdoll physics (albeit much easier to control)+ Multiplayer with friends or randoms+ A good variety of game modes and tweaks to keep things fresh for longer+ Likely a game that will be revisted a lot+ Amusing soundtrack and effects+ Lots of customizing options for your teamThe cons- Novelty may have the potential to wear off- Limited casual game, easy to try everything in one sitting9.5/10 -  Would put my dongle in a stranger's face again.

content:
Posted: August 1, 2014
												This game is a tremendously moving social commentary on the current state of Corporate America, and the struggles of the middle-class citizen.  Each mounter represents a member of our capitalist society clambering to be successful and live the American Dream, only to be shoved away and sat upon by another of their fellow citizens.  The goat represents the economic food chain, in which those who are weak are crushed by those who have become mad with power and influence.Or maybe this is a game about♥♥♥♥♥♥♥physics.10/10

content:
Posted: March 5, 2015
												Where do we begin..? Where do we begin when reviewing this amazing physics-based and homoerotic "Simulated 'Sportslike' Experience"?Well we begin with the fact that not only is it pretty addictive, it's pretty damn hilarious to boot. Definitely some of the loudest and most uncontrollable laughing moments I've ever had with friends online. The characters in the game are all 100% customizable too, you can put your face on the heads of these characters, change the limbs with other images, give them names, nationalities, and voices (grunts).After playing this game you will reach what is called 'englightenment', and you will be at peace with everything that is in this universe, because naked men climbing eachother just shows you the way.Liked this review? number of helpful: 137 of 177 people (77%) found this review helpful1 person found this review funny
content:
Posted: July 30, 2014
												Mount your Friends is the pinnacle of adrenaline-pumping sports.You start out climbing ontop of a goat, then the next sportsman climbs ontop of the last in an ever-expanding tower.The sheer pressure under which the athletes must work is astonishing, nevermind their determination to reach the top anew with each passing round. You yourself as a spectator can even feel the pressure when they struggle to reach the top with each second ticking past them.Do not miss out on the sensation that is sure to sweep across Steam in a maelstrom of popularity and join today to mount friends and strangers in a struggle that is all too real and will surely leave you wanting more.

number of helpful: 110 of 145 people (76%) found this review helpful
content:
Posted: July 29, 2014
												I have played Mount Your Friends on Xbox for a little while now, always with friends, and it's the game that the group always ask to play first.At it's core there is a very simple premise that is executed very well. Get your man to the top of the pile in 60 seconds.But it's the great art style, wicked sense of humour and... well... that slapping of flesh on flesh that makes us laugh every single time.The game runs great for even those like me, who have an old, slow, crappy laptop as their only source of PC gaming and is a bargain coming in at the same cost of a sandwich.I can not wait to bring this out next time friends are round so that we may mount each other all over again.

number of helpful: 64 of 75 people (85%) found this review helpful43 people found this review funny
content:
Posted: August 10, 2015
												I made a dog-pile of eleven near-naked muscular sweaty men.  I do not regret this.Mount Your Friends is a simple competitive climbing game.You have four buttons, one for each limb, and a mouse or joystick to guide what direction you send them in.Multiplayer is turn-based and your aim is to climb to the highest point and finish your turn before the timer runs out, hopefully out-lasting your opponent in this game of 'dash up the man mountain'.Its silly fun and the controls, while challenging for the first two minutes, are very well executed.Its a game that achieves what it sets out to do.  9/10
